divorce.description: Divorces you to your current partner (I will charge 300 yens to divorce).

divorce.successfullyDivorced: Sure, I will call the lawyers. The both of you will pay `300` yens for it.
divorce.rejectedRequest: I think the oracle of love didn't let you separate. I'm glad you guys got along.

rep.cannotGiveRepForYourself: you can't give reputation for yourself.

marry.youNeedToMarry: you need have more `{{0}}` yens to marry.
marry.theyNeedToMarry: sorry, but {{0}} need more `{{1}}` yens to marry.
marry.youAlreadyMarried: you can't marry with another user, because you are already married.
marry.theyAlreadyMarried: you can't marry with {{0}}, because {{0}} is already married.
marry.requestConfirm: {{0}}, do you agree to get married with {{1}}, in sickness and in health, in richness and in poorness until death do part you both?
marry.successfullyMarried: yay! Congratulations, now you are married.
marry.rejectedRequest: what a pity. It seems that {{0}} doesn't want to share her life with you, maybe {{0}} isn't the love of her life, I think there was an error in the oracle of love.
marry.cannotMarryWithYourself: you can't marry with yourself, are you blind or what? Sorry, but, I can't allow this.
marry.cannotMarryWithMe: sorry little usagi. You can't marry with me. I'm sorry, but, I don't love you the same as you love me, I love you, but as, a friend.
marry.cannotMarryWithBot: you can't marry with a bot, because he's will never accept.
